capabilities.name: DAC_OVERRIDE

capabilities.name: FOWNER

capabilities.name: SETGID

capabilities.name: SETUID

groups.name: User and Group Configuration
groups.description: Configure User and Group for Omada Controller

attrs.label: User ID
attrs.description: The user id that Omada Controller files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Group ID
attrs.description: The group id that Omada Controller files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Manage HTTP Port
attrs.description: Management portal HTTP port

attrs.label: Port Bind Mode
attrs.description:
The port bind mode.</br>
- Publish: The port will be published on the host for external access.</br>
- Expose: The port will be exposed for inter-container communication.</br>
- None: The port will not be exposed or published.</br>
Note: If the Dockerfile defines an EXPOSE directive,
the port will still be exposed for inter-container communication regardless of this setting.

1.3.8.readme:
Omada Controller

Omada Controller is a network management controller for Omada (TP-Link) Equipment.

capabilities.description: Omada Controller is able to change file ownership arbitrarily
capabilities.name: CHOWN

capabilities.description: Omada Controller is able to bypass file permission checks
capabilities.name: DAC_OVERRIDE

capabilities.description: Omada Controller is able to bypass permission checks for file operations
capabilities.name: FOWNER

capabilities.description: Omada Controller is able to change group ID of processes
capabilities.name: SETGID

capabilities.description: Omada Controller is able to change user ID of processes
capabilities.name: SETUID
